item.description:
The Boston By Foot Halloween Tour.

Walk the dark side on All Hallows' Eve and there's no better place to do it than on a guided tour of Beacon Hill. Hear stories of ghosts, murders and mayhem that haunt this quiet neighborhood while walking among the Halloween decorations and the tons of people who come to Beacon Hill every year to celebrate.

If you have never been to Beacon Hill on Halloween, this is one of those must-see events in Boston.

This ninety-minute tour will highlight Beacon Hill's rich heritage of mystery and suspense. See the home of the murdered George Parkman and learn what happened to his dismembered body. See where the Quakers were hanged and famous men buried, and many more scenes of the macabre.

Tickets for the tour are $15 ($6 for Boston By Foot members) and can be purchased directly from your guides (cash only please). The tour begins at 5:30pm so please arrive about 10 minutes earlier.

Costumes optional.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group of people at the State House steps in costumes.
item.name: Beacon Hill With A BOO! Halloween Walking Tour
